presentation.summary: Welcome to my portfolio! I am a graduate programmer from the UTN FRGP in  Argentina. Currently, I am exploring this vast world and learning to one day contribute my bit to the community

technologies.title: Technologies
technologies.description: In this section, I present the technologies I use as a programmer. Additionally, I will share some useful resources that may be helpful to you.

contact.title: Contact
contact.descriptionOne: If you have any inquiries, questions, or just want to talk about this great world of programming or other interesting things, feel free to contact me.
contact.descriptionTwo: The email field is optional, but if you want me to get in touch with you, it's necessary to fill it out.
